Plot: In life, not every sin goes unpunished. GHOST STORY For four aging men in the terror-stricken town of Milburn, New York, an act inadvertently carried out in their youth has come back to haunt them. Now they are about to learn what happens to those who believe they can bury the past -- and get away with murder.
Characters: Edward Wanderley, Sears James, Ricky Hawthorne, Don Wanderley, Alma Mobley, Angie Maule, Stella Hawthorne, John Jaffrey, Lewis Benedikt, Eva Galli, Anna Mostyn, Ann-Veronica Moore, Milly Sheehan, Peter Barnes, Jim Hardie, Christina Barnes, Otto Gruebe, Freddy Robinson, Florence de Peyser
